item.title: Fundamentals Say Bet Against the Recent Adobe Downgrade
item.description: Adobe's discount will eventually become clear to the rest of the market, where investors can ignore a recent downgrade by Wall Street analysts.

item.title: AppLovin Stock Momentum Builds With $800+ Analyst Price Target
item.description: AppLovin continues to make waves, with shares gaining on a latest round of price target upgrades. UBS sees the stock moving above $800.

item.title: Which National Chains Do People Wish Were in Their State? [2025 Survey]
item.description: Discover which national chains Americans crave most by state — from In-N-Out to IKEA — in our 2025 brand popularity survey of 3,000+ respondents.

item.title: A Closer Look at D-Wave's Big Gains in September: More in Store?
item.description: D-Wave (QBTS) soared 68% in a month on Fed rate cuts and quantum optimism, but analysts see downside amid sky-high valuation and rising short interest...

item.title: Dividend Growth Continues as 3 Big Stocks Raise Payouts
item.description: Dividends are on the rise at three of the biggest names in the market: Texas Instruments, T-Mobile, and Target. See how high their yields now stretch.
